Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
// Should this fail to because it doesn't have "Uses: other.ns" ?

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org
CodeSystem:     BOO = http://boo.org
CodeSystem:     ZOO = http://zoo.org

Entry: SimpleGroup
Concept:      FOO#bar, BOO#far, ZOO#bear
Description:  "It is a group entry with a code value"
Value:        concept
Property:     Simple 0..1
Property:     Coded 0..*
Property:     Simple2 1..*
Property:     other.ns.Thing 1..1

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Coded
Value:          concept

Element:        Simple2
Value:          string
